byline.contributor: Hannah Berkeley Cohen contributed reporting from Santa Clara, Cuba.

abstract: JetBlue Flight 387 leaves Fort Lauderdale for Cuba, first scheduled commercial flight between two countries since 1961.
snippet: The last time that an airline in the United States had a regularly scheduled flight to the island, the passengers flew on a propeller plane....
lead_paragraph: The last time that an airline in the United States had a regularly scheduled flight to the island, the passengers flew on a propeller plane.

headline.main: Scheduled Flights to Cuba From U.S. Begin Again, Now With Jet Engines
headline.print_headline: Scheduled Flights to Cuba Resume, Now With Jets
